pkgmetadata.longdescription: DSM and LiDAR Downloader // A collection of functions to search and download Digital Surface Model (DSM) and Light Detection and Ranging (LiDAR) data via APIs, including 'OpenTopography' https://portal.opentopography.org/apidocs/ and 'TNMAccess' https://apps.nationalmap.gov/tnmaccess/#/, and canopy tree height data.
